body: Wonder when "Cube Form" will get it's own tag LOL (Likely when they finally give Netorase, Reverse NTR and Netori their own away from NTR I guess, I mean took a while for some artists to finally understand they don't NEED to make a Swinging Doujin be NTR! Hell I'll stand SCAT if it's used for humiliating the girl instead of her shitting and eating it for the sake of eating and fucking! More the humiliation and degeneration of being "forced" I guess! Or another case of the famous "Why Boner" LOL)
